casebody.data:
Emilie Raberg Noel, Respondent v. H. Bencke Lithographic Company, et al., Appellants. Decided November 3, 1890. Appeal from a judgment entered on the verdict of a jury in favor of plaintiff, and also from a judgment dismissing counter-claims set up bythe Lithograph Company, on the merits. Hatch & Warren, for appellants. De-Lancy Nicoll, for respondent.

Before Freedman and Ingraham, JJ.

The Court held (Ingraham, J., writing, Freedman, J., concurring) that the judgments should be affirmed, with costs.
